column4: Hi. I am having 80 GB harddisk . I am panning to install Windows 7 Ultimate and Ubuntu 12.10. Any ideas or tips how I should partition the disk?.

during the Windows install you should have the option to create the install partition. You'll want to make sure it doesn't use the whole drive.
